Group.Group Name: AquaStar Anime, TheWaffleHouse & Sprocket Hole Subs

Good Comments: Nothing wrong with their subs, nice typesetting, and about the encode, the raws being provided are shit to start with. And no, this isn't speedsub, the people here are involved in the game's translation too.
undefined
Fast and reliable with good translations. Been following their subs since the days of Kanon 2006. ^_^
better off with ss eclipse
SS-Eclipse better
pretty good performance, on par with ss-eclipse if you ask me
3 fansub groups in on the same project and yet they can't match what 2 can do.
Fast and about the same quality as SS-Eclipse. no need to fanboy over fansubbers.
subs are good just that quality isnt as good as SS
Fast, accurate, and NOT SPEEDSUBS.
Faster while retaining a good quality of subs
Greatest.
Their quality is bad, and they don't even use the wide-screen version. wtf
Same group is working on translating the Visual Novel.  Only releasing 4:3 for now, but will work on the DVDs as they release. Only weak point is that I think they self-promote a little too much.
Speedy has hell
Not as good as SS-Eclipse but still a good alternative.
Perfect Subs
Bad Comments: Decent subs and tend to release faster than SS-Ecilpse, but Eclipse's subs tend to be of a slightly higher quality.
They aren't bad, but SS-Eclipse is better.
Good subs since they are speedsubbers.

Poor image/encode quality, like watching a .flv from a streaming site.
This is just speedshit. Watch SS-Eclipse.
Though their subs were occasionally awkwardly translated, they were always fast to release, and their video quality was comparable to, say, SS-Eclipse's.
Eclipse and SS are obviously better, but that doesn't mean these guys don't do a good job. They are out extremely quick and their subs are exceptionally good.
Faster that SS-Eclipse and video quality is more or less on a par.  Although now that both groups are finished, I'd go for SS-E.
They're very prompt at subbing a show after it comes out, and seem to do a good job of translating in the short time frame.
